Package it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NetworkInterface
    Interface that provides methods for both RMI and Socket interfaces
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    Main class on the client side of the game, allows to select the type of connection between RMI and Socket
    ClientRMIInterface
    RMI version of the connection interface Gets a remotely callable instance of the server, and provides to the game server a remotely callable instance of the client
    ClientSocketInterface
    Socket version of the connection interface Create two channels for the socket output and two for input, respectively for Strings and Objects
    CommandHandler
    Class that receives a map of commands from the socket interface and communicate with the view asking the needed inputs for every request
    NetworkInterfaceFactory
    Implementation of the "factory" pattern that provides an instance of a RMI or Socket interface based on the user input
    RMIHandler
    Handler reachable by server via remote stub that provides to server methods to call the view in the various phases of the game
